abce.agency.finance
Class Accounts

java.lang.Object
  abce.agency.Agent
      abce.agency.finance.Accounts
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class Accounts
extends Agent
implements java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

Tracks financial condition and performance for entities representing business firms.

Author:
kkoning

verify

public boolean verify(ProductionAction productionAction,
                      double cost)
Checks to see if the firm has enough resources to support the proposed production at the proposed cost.

Parameters:
productionAction - the proposed production
cost - the cost thereof
Returns:
true if the firm is financially capable of financing the production, false otherwise.

finance

Parameters:

Returns:
true if the financing is successful, false otherwise.
